channel.title: Making take other things than coins
channel.description: ok i know there's a tut for this but it didn't do me any good because when i tried to use stuff like cwars tickets, tokens, etc for a different way to make a shop it said"not enough coins"when i got coins it said "not enough tokens" when i got tokens it made me buy two for the price of one....so how do i do this?

item.title: Making take other things than coins
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

my shops are noting like that my shops look all like this one

shop = 38	Robe_Store		2	2	2894	500	2914	500	2924	500	2934	500	2896	500	2906	500	2916	500	2926	500	2936	500	2908	500	2918	500	2928	500	2938	500	2900	500	2910	500	2920	500	2930	500	2940	500	2902	500	2912	500	2922	500	2932	500	2942	500

item.title: Making take other things than coins
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

blo0d pker:

no i want shops to still be able to take coins, but i need them to also take tokens for different shops

facepalm i guess i show you…

shop = 1 Example #1 GENERAL “Coins"995"Coins” 590 10 1755 10 946 10 1351 10 1265 10 2347 10 952 10 5341 10 5343 10 5329 10 1933 10
shop = 2 Exmaple #2 GENERAL “Frog Tokens"6183"Frog Tokens” 590 10 1755 10 946 10 1351 10 1265 10 2347 10 952 10 946 10 5341 10 5343 10 5329 10 1933 10 2552 20
shop = 1 Example #3 GENERAL “Coins"995"Coins” 590 10 1755 10 946 10 1351 10 1265 10 2347 10 952 10 5341 10 5343 10 5329 10 1933 10

(the “Coins” ###“Coins” and “Frog Tokens” arent meant to be in the real thing) im just making it BLATENTLY obvious what it means)

basically you specify which shops you change the currency in

this probably won’t even work depends what revision your using too… 317, 474, 508 etc what?

Read full topic

item.title: Making take other things than coins
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

define your revision…

im assuming the obvious so goto shops.cfg on the shop id you are editing and wanting to take tokens or what ever it will say 995 after the name of the shop (995 being the id code for coins) so change 995 to the item id of your tokens

Read full topic
